comment.author: 61361160@N00
comment._content: So much an image of its time! We used to talk among the women in my family about the change in childbirth from one generation to another. I was the first generation of mothers to have my husband's presence actually expected, rather than forbidden or tolerated.

comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: Unofficial West Hospital Preservation Society on Flickr.

comment.author: 15705594@N00
comment._content: Coulda been me if the picture was taken seven months later.
